mapper.sql: id, identify_college_id, user_id, college_no, institute_no, entrance_time, graduation_time, degree_no, profession_name, enabled , create_by, update_by, create_at, update_at, identify_status, student_no, id_card_no, identify_type, grade
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_user_degree_identify
institute_no = #{instituteNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
entrance_time = #{entranceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
graduation_time = #{graduationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
degree_no = #{degreeNo,jdbcType=TINYINT},
profession_name = #{professionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identify_status = #{identifyStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
student_no = #{studentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_at = NOW()
WHERE identify_college_id = #{identifyCollegeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
